item.title: PI Client Login Box background
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[quote=“Sammy_May, post:9, topic:385435”][quote author=staypuff link=topic=481191.msg3526396#msg3526396 date=1299861578]

Mother ducker be stealin’ our client?

If you can’t figure out how to change the login image give up on rsps now.

Srry for being a dick but I don’t apretiate people stealing work from others.

How the fuck is it your client?

Use toms cache editor.

Credits to Galkon obviously, but I can tell by that login box that it is from a server made by me and two other guys. Seeing as it was not released, it must have been stolen. So yes, I don’t like it that someone stole our client (or at least our work that went into it).
[/quote]

Lawl. Bet that just makes you so angryy. ^[/quote]

super mangry

Read full topic

@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

Usually they are in the Sprites folder, look for loginbox or just look up all sprites and you may find it. But if they are packed into the cache then use Tom’s Cache Suite.
